Lead Page Email Templates are used to send an email with a link to the selected lead page to a new prospect.
Presentation Email Templates are used to send an email with a link to the selected presentation to an existing prospect.
Prospect Email Templates are used to send an email to a prospect in the Sales Management System.
Contact Email Templates are used to send an email to a contact in the Contact Management System.
Customer Email Templates are used to send an email to a customer in the Customer Management System.

Information Pages are webpages containing any information to be shared with others including scripts, instructions, links to other resources, etc. Your information pages can be accessed from anywhere including success track steps and other information pages.
Training Pages are displayed by category to team members.
Import Pages
All Pages in the "Import/Page" Folder will be imported to the following company and member.

Company Prospect Templates have the Sales Campaign # in the Category.
Company Contact Templates have the Sales Campaign # in the Category.
Company Customer Templates have the Sales Campaign # in the Category.

You may include replacable tags enclosed in curly brackets for the prospect's first name {firstname}, last name {lastname}, email {email}, phone {phone}, source {source}, next event {event}, unique identifier {id}, member's first name {m-firstname}, member's last name {m-lastname}, member's email address {m-email}, member's phone number {m-phone}, member's id {m-id} and the member's signature {signature}.

Your training page may be accessed from anywhere you can use a URL (link) at
My Resource Center

You can create your own resources in addition to the company provided ones. You can create success tracks for members and customers; email templates for lead pages, presentations, and prospect emails; and you can upload support documents and create your own web information pages. Click the desired icon below to create and manage your personal resources.

Upload Page
Click the Browse button to select a web page (.htm file) from your personal computer. After you have selected the desired web page, click the Submit button to upload it to the system.
Page Uploaded Successfully!
Upload Image
Click the browse button to select an image file to upload. Recomended size is 200 width by 112 height. Images must be under 100 KB in size with an extension of .png, .jpg, or .gif.
